com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Class SmartCommands.GuardedException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
SmartCommands
public static class SmartCommands.GuardedException
extends java.lang.Exception

An exception which acts as an Throwable wrapper, and which works in combination with the SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand. It will be triggered during the SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommmand.onThrowable(Throwable) method.

The traditional case is to let the exception handler cope in a centralized way with this kind of exception.

Since:
2011.11.03
See Also:
Serialized Form

public final java.lang.String displayMessage
Constructor Detail

SmartCommands.GuardedException

protected SmartCommands.GuardedException(java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                                         java.lang.String displayMessage)
Builds a wrapper over the provided exception, and with an attached human readable message.

Parameters:
throwable - the exception to be wrapped
displayMessage - the supposedly i18ned message that will be used later on when actually handling that exception
